description:
'It's always a pleasure,' coming in, says James, who is in front of the camera of our guest director Mike. James is such a good looking guy, with a deep voice, hot body and big dick. He's just swoonworthy, I tell you.

This is the second time we've had James in front of the camera all by his lonesome. Actually, we've had this scene stashed away for quite some time.

After doing this solo, James went on to do two duo scenes with us, but he's yet to suck a dick (though, he's touched another man's cock, so it's a start!). He paired up with Corey (who blew James) and Drew (who also slurped down James' big one).

Will James return and cross the line? Only time will tell!

Until then, enjoy this new look at a previously unreleased solo from James.
title: James (Solo II)
